empty-state-subheading: Let’s start by estimating your company’s carbon emissions. Select the path that better suits your needs
empty-state-viewer-subtitle: Before we can show any charts, your company will need to provide us with some data
submissions-option-form-sub-heading: Two options to help identify the biggest emissions “hot spots” in your value chains
emissions-trendline-disclaimer: * The accuracy of the trendline depends on the historic data submitted. We use Polynomial Regression to determine the emissions trendline, which may change in time due to macro-economic factors.
emissions-trendline-read-more: Read more about our calculation here
emissions-trendline-empty-message: We need 3 years of historic data to show your emissions trendline
emissions-trendline-hide-toast-success: We’ll show this component again when you have 3 years of historic data.
emissions-trendline-hide-toast-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
emissions-trendline-chart-tooltip-insuff: Insufficient historic data to calculate - min. 3 years
company-relationships-invites-alert-titl: You have {{ invitationCount }} outstanding requests to review
company-relationships-invites-alert-subt: For more details go to your company account page
missing-privacy-info-modal-body: We need your help to increase transparency, throught out the supply chain network. For that we'll need to know which of your data is publicy available. This should only take a couple of minutes.
